resources.string: Specific Step’s service profile is Virtual, various, and versatile type. The primary service profile includes services like:
\u25CF DTH account recharge by using DTH recharge API
\u25CF Data card account refill and recharge
\u25CF Long distance Bus ticket booking service

Specific Step offers a gamut of all-inclusive Mobile Recharge Application and Services like Online Mobile Recharge API that provides nonstop online service connectivity from the cellular operators across India to the target point of sale.

Specific Step supports balance recharge for all leading service providers within India in mobile, DTH by using Online Mobile Recharge API, and DATA card service providers.With Specific Step, Prepaid Recharge process has upgraded into a hassle-free and easy to manage method for the service pro- vider as well as for its target consumer lines. Specific Step with its manifold functionalities can good back end support for exponential improvement in operator line efficiency, generating additional revenue, and by providing well- organized 24x7 service to the subs-cribers. Consumers, on the other hand, enjoy a safe, suitable means of buying prepaid services at retail points and self- service kiosks connected to the centrally located Specific Step server.
A quick synopsis of the multiple rewards of getting connected with Specific Step :

Specific Step ropes wide-ranging Retail POS hardware (PC and Mobile) and wire connectivity with different retailer locations. The Specific Step special software at the server coordinates the selling of mobile top up and instantly recharges to different range of wireless handheld POS terminals located at various retailer points.
A business venture harbored on technology expanded for tomorrow’s convenience.

Specific Step is one of the largest one-point recharge service providers for Mobile Rechargevia mobile recharge software, Data Card Recharge, DTH Recharge, Bill Payments, Air-Ticket Booking, Bus Ticket Booking, and Hotel Booking requirement within Indian Territory.Specific Step has introduced the ultra cool system of electronic virtual distribution (using WEB/SMS) of services like refill of Prepaid Airtime, DTH/TV Recharges, Air/Bus Tickets, Bill/Utility pay- ments on behalf of service providers via Mobile Recharge API. Specific Steps technology enabled transaction platform maintains and processes successfully around 1 million customer transactions monthly, with more than 10,000 customer touch points.

Specific Step was launched in market on January 2012, the business initiative was primarilyinspired by a Indian business entrepreneur for rendering efficient and cost effective retail recharge services for Indian mass prepaid users along with other-services via an efficient and technology supported virtual network of service distribution and payment collection. Specific Step was effectively operating in market since 2012 with its Prepaid Recharge API.

Mr Ravi Palan, the founder of this unique business initiative has acquired vast knowledge inmobile/cellular industry since its inception in India in terms of mass use. Mr Palan has exceptional quality and potential to start and develop business ventures from the scratch to the high, where sky is the limit.

Specific Step has overseas business alliance with Indian Telecom. Indian Tele- com is a monopoly market leader in allocation and circulation of virtual prepaid airtime. This business alliance has proved immense effective in catering refill service for Indian consumers dealing with prepaid mobile services, DTH service s, and Data card. Efficient strategies, sincerity in service rendering, and meti- culous coordination of have promoted Specific Step to its present leading position in its business category. The virtue of this virtual business platform is it is extremely beneficial for the consumers as well as for its business associates to enjoy optimum profitability, short-term and long-term and thus promotion Indian business and trading industry to rise at its peak, credit goes to Single Sim Recharge Software.
